column3: The reason that the silent flag is there is because sometimes the .pro is run through multiple times (the system call is executed multiple times) so to prevent error spam.\n
I can revert it, but found it usefull to see all info displayed. I think you are the one that doesn't like silent errors :)?\n

True, I don't like silent errors/warnings, but the problem is that everyone gets the warnings for all translations every time they build, even though they can't fix them (and if they can they need to do it in transifex anyway). So it was kind of noise.\n
Removed the noise again and only use it on my local build then :).\n
